REF WW 333. 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS 
FROM STORM PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL 
DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 30SSE HMV-140ESE ILM-130SSE ILM-190ENE PBI-70ENE 
PBI-130SE MIA-80WSW EYW-90W SRQ-170S CEW-30NE MSL-30SSE HMV 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS 
FROM STORM PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL 
DETAILS.
